reviewText: Produced in 2003, this 56 minute VHS video is concerned with new scientific research that dispels the notion of genetic differences as the basis of differences among racial groups. High school students of different "races" map their DNA and are astonished to find that their DNA map is more similar to students of other "races" in their high school class than students of their own "race".  The video then explores environmental factors that may have caused biological differences among "racial" groups to evolve over thousands of years. [...]
